#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long n,p,ans=0;
    long a[50];
        long i=0;
        scanf("%ld",&n);
        long long m=1;
        while(m<=n)
        {
            a[i]=m;
            i++;
            m*=2;
        }
        i--;
        p=n;
        while(p!=0)
        {
            ans+=p/a[i];
            p%=a[i];
            i--;
        }
        printf("%ld\n",ans);
    return 0;
}
